body:

Congratulations- DAY6

The Best Damn Thing- Avril Lavigne

Grand Piano- Nicki Minaj

thank u, next- Ariana Grande

We Don’t Talk Anymore- Charlie Puth ft. Selena Gomez

summary: Some of you SAY you’re on TJ’s fashion sense defense squad and then in the same breath say you hate his flaming basketball...
body:
Some of you SAY you’re on TJ’s fashion sense defense squad and then in the same breath say you hate his flaming basketball shirt?? smh that’s his best look. It’s quintessential TJ. It RADIATES dumbass gay jock. 

How can you call yourself a TJ stan and yet hate on that look.

summary: i’m still curious how things went down with TJ and the gun situation. like, did he leave soon after Cyrus did? The way he says...
body:
i’m still curious how things went down with TJ and the gun situation. like, did he leave soon after Cyrus did? The way he says “I wouldn’t have gone if I knew there’d be a gun” makes it seem like he wouldn’t have stuck around for Reed to actually use it, but he seemed so frozen in place during the episode…. and what point did he actually get out of there? And did he actually confront Reed at any point, or did he go “uh peace out homies” and then reported it? Did Reed fight with TJ about being reported, or just silently agreed they were friends anymore?

I have so many questions, Terri.

reblog.comment:
i’m still curious how things went down with TJ and the gun situation. like, did he leave soon after Cyrus did? The way he says “I wouldn’t have gone if I knew there’d be a gun” makes it seem like he wouldn’t have stuck around for Reed to actually use it, but he seemed so frozen in place during the episode…. and what point did he actually get out of there? And did he actually confront Reed at any point, or did he go “uh peace out homies” and then reported it? Did Reed fight with TJ about being reported, or just silently agreed they were friends anymore?

I have so many questions, Terri.

trail.content_raw:

The way he says “I wouldn’t have gone if I knew there’d be a gun” makes it seem like he wouldn’t have stuck around for Reed to actually use it, but he seemed so frozen in place during the episode…. and what point did he actually get out of there? And did he actually confront Reed at any point, or did he go “uh peace out homies” and then reported it? Did Reed fight with TJ about being reported, or just silently agreed they were friends anymore?

I have so many questions, Terri.

i’m still curious how things went down with TJ and the gun situation. like, did he leave soon after Cyrus did? The way he says “I wouldn’t have gone if I knew there’d be a gun” makes it seem like he wouldn’t have stuck around for Reed to actually use it, but he seemed so frozen in place during the episode…. and what point did he actually get out of there? And did he actually confront Reed at any point, or did he go “uh peace out homies” and then reported it? Did Reed fight with TJ about being reported, or just silently agreed they were friends anymore?

I have so many questions, Terri.

tags: im gonna add a jonah part
summary: country bois
body:
country bois

in all his days of teenagedom,

he believed he was number one,

a city slicker, a country hater,

but then he found out he was wrong…

country boy kippen

in emojis he’s licken 👅

on boys he’s hitten

for Cyrus he’s smitten

took a little bit for him to adjust, but his rainbow cowboy hat is now a must

country boy kippen

now reed Miller, a cowboy by choice

he looked at guns, said they’re “noice”

he loved his weed and wanted to be free

so he went to the one place where he could be…

country boy Miller

he owns guns but he’s not a killer

snorts cocaine cause he’s a thriller

he might be a seller

so if you want to buy some guns and drugs, you know who to find

country boy Miller

at first Cyrus, he wasn’t sure

he thought country was a bore

but then his bf said por favor

bc he’s whipped he answered “shore”…

country boy goodman

his country phase has began

he’s even got a dark tan

and yodel good music he can

now after many months and months, he’s a great cowboy we all can trust

country boy goodman

summary: Obvious, adj: My love for you is like a shirt I choose to put on each and every morning, your name spelled out on the front. I...

summary: i want andi, buffy, tj, and cyrus hanging out and cyrus is animatedly talking about something and then suddenly andi’s and...
body:
i want andi, buffy, tj, and cyrus hanging out and cyrus is animatedly talking about something and then suddenly andi’s and buffy’s eyes shift to the background 

which cyrus notices, looks back, and sees it’s jonah and sighs “of course, i’m not even surprised” and stops talking

and tj who hasn’t taken his attention away from cyrus for one second says “why did you stop talking? so was the pigeon okay?”

and cyrus just MELTS and continues his story

blog.name: kippentrash
blog.title: It's our THING
blog.description:
TJ Kippen and Tyrus Stan | The AM cast deserves the world

She/her | Trash(a) | 18 | @stellahex's AM sideblog

These kids are trying their best ok

Can rant for days and prone to tangents | Come interact I like new friends

tags: idk anyone who dislikes him but if you do
open ur eyes he is a sunshine boi
in this house we love walker
even tho we kno his fate is inevitable
question: 🍦
answer:
🍦: A character you disliked but now you like?

…ok please don’t hate me for this but? W-walker?

I SWEAR THERE’S GOOD REASON I just thought Walker was going to be a throwaway character being used as a plot device and with like basic nice guy personality and that the only way to resolve the Jandi drama was to do him dirty. I guess I was trying to make sure I didn’t get attached before the inevitable? THIS WAS JUST THE BARMITZFAH EP SO. PLEASE SPARE ME.

Technically he still IS being used as a plot device which sucks because the poor boy deserves so much better. After he came back a few times I’m like UGH NO THEYRE GONNA GET RID OF HIM FOR JANDI BUT I LOVE HIM WHY. And then they brought him back and he was so chill about everything and held no malice and I was so happy?? He was done dirty, but in a way that didn’t destroy his character, which I loved.

Then even when he came back for Wuffy he’s trying his best to not cause too much conflict between Andi and Buffy and I just??? CUT THE KID SOME SLACK HE’S DOING HIS BEST ;-; Now I love him to death which hurts because I KNOW the only option they have is to do him dirty. I KNOW. But while I’m excited for Muffy back and Bandi conflict to resolve I’m so upset that I know he’s gonna need to be a casualty.
